Articles.Content:
I was reading an excellent explanation of asparagus staging by Vanamonde and toward the end he mentioned a mod I'd not heard of before called SmartStage. Not only is the article http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/59834-asparagus-staging-an-explanation/ a great help but I downloaded SmartStage and already love it. I find setting the staging extremely tedious and it drives me nuts how it can change from the way I've set it inside VAB to something else on the launching pad.

So: thaniks very much Vanamonde.

You're welcome, except that was actually TheGreatB3 replying to my post.  

So I fixed your thread title to direct the credit where it's due.
